section.name: LoggerAppenderPhp
section.p: LoggerAppenderPhp logs events by creating a PHP user-level message using the PHP's trigger_error()function.
The message type depends on the event's severity level:

ul.li: E_USER_NOTICE when the event's level is equal to or less than INFO
E_USER_WARNING when the event's level is equal to WARN
E_USER_ERROR when the event's level is equal to or greater than ERROR

subsection.name: Layout
subsection.p: This appender requires a layout. If no layout is specified in configuration, LoggerLayoutSimple will be used by default.

subsection.name: Parameters
subsection.p: This appender has no configurable parameters.
